dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4421 IH: MotorCities National Heritage Area Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Dingell introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To extend the authorization for the Automobile National Heritage Area in Michigan.

section.header: Automobile National Heritage Area Authorization extended

subsection.text: This Act may be cited as the MotorCities National Heritage Area Extension Act.
Section 109 of the Automobile National Heritage Area Act (16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 105â€“355) is amended by striking September 30, 2014 and inserting September 30, 2030.
